title: 1950년 Leacock & Co. v. United States 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Leacock & Co. v. United States. 판결일: 1950-11-30. 법원: United States Customs Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Leacock & Company, Inc. v. United States
**판결일**: 1950-11-30
**법원**: United States Customs Court
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Johnson

## 인용

- 25 Cust. Ct. 328

## 판결문 요약


Opinion by
Johnson, J.
At the trial it was stipulated that the issue herein is similar in all material respects to that involved in United States v. Browne Vintners Co., Inc. (34 C. C. P. A. 112, C. A. D. 351) and that the merchandise, consisting of embroidered flax napkins, was not in fact received by the importer. In accordance with stipulation of' counsel and following the decision cited it was held that duty is not assessable upon said flax napkins missing from the imported cases. The protest was sustained to this extent.
...
